findings.title: approve
findings.description: The approve function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function has no access control and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _transferFromExcluded function allowing unauthorized token transfer

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The permit function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as External and marked with 🛑, indicating a potential security risk.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: Potential burn tokens functionality without proper access control or validation.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The swap function has potential vulnerabilities due to fee-on-transfer tokens and lack of proper validation.
findings.function: swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH, swapETHForExactTokens

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in the skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any access modifiers and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The variables are not initialized before they are used.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: External function call without proper validation, potentially allowing unauthorized access or malicious behavior.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee on transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee-on-transfer token support.
